long_description: The KryptoFlex 1007 cable is looped at each end, making it perfect for security when combined with quick-release components such as Kryptonite U-locks, disc locks and padlocks, all sold separately. 7 ft. x 3/8 in. (213cm x 10mm) braided steel cable provides solid cut resistance. KryptoFlex 1000 features a protective vinyl cover.
short_description: The KryptoFlex 1007 cable is looped at each end, making it perfect for security when combined with quick-release components such as Kryptonite U-locks, disc locks and padlocks, all sold separately.
